product_name: bareMineralsORIGINAL Mineral Veil Talc-Free Loose Setting Powder
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganbareMinerals ORIGINAL MINERAL VEIL Loose Setting Powder is a weightless, talc-free setting powder. It works for all skin tones to set and extend makeup wear, absorb oil and blur the appearance of fine lines and pores giving a naturally airbrushed finish, with no flashback..
details: DetailsBenefitsFormula absorbs oil to keep skin looking freshMinimizes the look of pores and imperfections for a filtered, soft-focus finish with no flashbackDermatologist-testedHypoallergenicNon-comedogenicNon-acnegenicNo photo flashbackFeaturesAll BareMinerals products are free of parabens, phthalates, formaldehyde, chemical sunscreens, triclosan, triclocarban, propylene glycol, mineral oil, coal tar and microbeadsThis product is also formulated without talc, gluten or synthetic fragranceKey IngredientsCORN STARCH: Minimizes the appearance of fine lines and pores, while absorbing oil to keep skin looking freshIRON OXIDES: Mineral-based pigments for natural-looking color and coverageItem 5081177How To UseSwirl a small amount of Mineral Veil by angling the Flawless Application Face Brush and swirl into the lid until all the Mineral Veil has been tucked into the bristles.Tap away excess. There should be no visible Mineral Veil on the outside of the brush. Buff the Mineral Veil into the skin in a circular motion, starting on the outside of your face near your cheekbone, swirling as you go. Buff around your face and then approach your forehead, cheeks, and nose.Tips: Soak it up. For oilier complexions, in humid climates, or with heavy moisturizers, start with an application of Mineral Veil before applying ORIGINAL Foundation Broad Spectrum SPF 15 or Matte Foundation Broad Spectrum SPF 15. For a day-to-evening look, swirl Clear Radiance All Over Face Color along with the Mineral Veil.IngredientsZea Mays (Corn Starch), Corn Starch Modified, Zinc Stearate, Magnesium Stearate. May Contain: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Swirl a small amount of Mineral Veil by angling the Flawless Application Face Brush and swirl into the lid until all the Mineral Veil has been tucked into the bristles.Tap away excess. There should be no visible Mineral Veil on the outside of the brush. Buff the Mineral Veil into the skin in a circular motion, starting on the outside of your face near your cheekbone, swirling as you go. Buff around your face and then approach your forehead, cheeks, and nose.Tips: Soak it up. For oilier complexions, in humid climates, or with heavy moisturizers, start with an application of Mineral Veil before applying ORIGINAL Foundation Broad Spectrum SPF 15 or Matte Foundation Broad Spectrum SPF 15. For a day-to-evening look, swirl Clear Radiance All Over Face Color along with the Mineral Veil.
